<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6013|עָמֹק]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7743|שׁוּחַ]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7845|שַׁחַת]]</big>** | **<big>[[H1870|דֶּרֶךְ]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַת‎</span>]<sub>151</sub> **verb** ==go to ruin== (?), only derived species (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il = Biblical Hebrew, Ecclus. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שחיתה‎</span> [[Eccl.30.11|Eccl 30:11]] ***corrupt act***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***extirpate***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***injure, violate***; Tel Amarna <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ša—âtu***</u></abbr> is ***fall*** (especially of city), ***be prostrate*** (? of land), perhaps Canaanism (see [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>TelAm. Vocab</sup>.), Assyrian possibly <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šêtu***</u></abbr>, ***flee, escape*** (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אבד‎</span>); Old Aramaic (Zinjirli) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שחת‎</span> ***destroy*** [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>374</sup>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁחַת‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (assimilation of <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">), ***multilate***; — very improbable [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>179 denominative</sup> from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַת‎</span>); — 

**Niph\`al** ***be marred, spoiled, Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁחַת‎</span>, of waistcloth [[Jer.13.7|Jer 13:7]], vessel [[Jer.18.4|Jer 18:4]] ***be injured***, or even (hyperb.) ***ruined, Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשָּׁחֵת‎</span> [[Exod.8.20|Exod 8:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) of land (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְנֵי הֶעָרֹב‎</span>); ***be corrupted, corrupt***, in mnorals and rel., of earth, ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁחָ֑תָה‎</span> [[Gen.6.12|Gen 6:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִפְנֵי הָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשּׁ‎</span> v[[Gen.6.11|Gen 6:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); so ***Participle*** feminine plural as adjective <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִשְׁחָתוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.20.44|Ezek 20:44]]. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחֵת‎</span> [[Exod.32.7|Exod 32:7]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחֶתְךָ‎</span> [[Hos.13.9|Hos 13:9]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחַתָּ‎</span> [[Isa.14.20|Isa 14:20]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֵ֑תוּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.10|Jer 5:10]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֵת‎</span> [[Gen.13.10|Gen 13:10]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***spoil, ruin***, accusative of eye [[Exod.21.26|Exod 21:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), vineyard [[Jer.12.10|Jer 12:10]] (figurative), branches [[Nah.2.3|Nah 2:3]] (figurative), also = ***destroy***, accusative of person [[2Sam.1.14|2Sam 1:14]]; [[2Sam.14.11|2Sam 14:11]] (accusative omitted), [[Ezek.5.16|Ezek 5:16]]; [[Ezek.20.17|Ezek 20:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלבָֿשָׂר‎</span> [[Gen.6.17|Gen 6:17]]; [[Gen.9.15|Gen 9:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), city, fortress, etc., [[Gen.13.10|Gen 13:10]]; [[Gen.19.13|Gen 19:13]]; [[Gen.19.29|Gen 19:29]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[2Sam.24.16|2Sam 24:16]]; [[Jer.5.10|Jer 5:10]] (accusative omitted), [[Jer.48.18|Jer 48:18]]; [[Ezek.26.4|Ezek 26:4]]; [[Ezek.43.3|Ezek 43:3]]; [[Lam.2.5|Lam 2:5]], ***ruin*** temple v[[Lam.2.6|Lam 2:6]], nation [[Hos.11.9|Hos 11:9]]; [[Hos.13.9|Hos 13:9]] (read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחַתִּךָ‎</span> [[BDB#Oort|Oort]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]), land [[2Kgs.19.12|2Kgs 19:12]] (Hiph\`il in \|\| [[Isa.37.12|Isa 37:12]]), [[Judg.6.5|Judg 6:5]]; [[Josh.22.33|Josh 22:33]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.22.30|Ezek 22:30]]; [[Ezek.30.11|Ezek 30:11]], earth [[Gen.9.11|Gen 9:11]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> object (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> **3b**), city [[1Sam.23.10|1Sam 23:10]], person [[Num.32.15|Num 32:15]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲמָיו‎</span> [[Amos.1.11|Amos 1:11]], ***destroyed*** (stifled) ***his compassion*** (or, [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>K 28</sup> and others, ***the bonds of kinship***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲמִים‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּרִית‎</span> [[Mal.2.8|Mal 2:8]], i.e. violate it, see especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַרְצָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשׁ‎</span> (that is, ***semen***) [[Gen.38.9|Gen 38:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) ***he spoiled*** (it) ***upon the ground***, made it ineffective, = ***waste*** words [[Prov.23.8|Prov 23:8]]. 

**2.** ***pervert, corrupt***, accusative wisdom [[Ezek.28.17|Ezek 28:17]], absolute = ***deal corruptly***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶעֱמִיקוּ שִׁחֵתוּ‎</span> [[Hos.9.9|Hos 9:9]] (compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָמֹק‎</span>], p.770:b; but [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחְתּוֺ‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוח‎</span>), [[Exod.32.7|Exod 32:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.9.12|Deut 9:12]], so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Deut.32.5|Deut 32:5]]. **Hiph\`il**<sub>103</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁחִית‎</span> [[Gen.6.12|Gen 6:12]] +; 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִשְׁחַתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Jer.51.20|Jer 51:20]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁחִית‎</span> [[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁחִת‎</span> [[Mal.3.11|Mal 3:11]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁחֵת‎</span> [[1Chr.20.1|1Chr 20:1]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתַּשְׁחִתִי‎</span> [[Ezek.16.47|Ezek 16:47]], 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁחִתוּן‎</span> [[Deut.4.16|Deut 4:16]]; [[Deut.31.29|Deut 31:29]] ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁחִיתָהּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.25|2Kgs 18:25]] = [[Isa.36.10|Isa 36:10]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁחֵת‎</span> [[Deut.31.29|Deut 31:29]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁחִית‎</span> [[1Sam.26.15|1Sam 26:15]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁחִית‎</span> [[Gen.19.14|Gen 19:14]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***spoil, ruin***, accusative crop [[Judg.6.4|Judg 6:4]]; [[Mal.3.11|Mal 3:11]], trees [[Deut.20.19|Deut 20:19]]; [[Deut.20.20|Deut 20:20]]; [[Jer.11.19|Jer 11:19]] (figurative), vessels [[2Chr.36.19|2Chr 36:19]], houses [[2Chr.34.11|2Chr 34:11]], palaces [[Jer.6.5|Jer 6:5]] compare [[Isa.65.8|Isa 65:8]]; [[Lev.19.27|Lev 19:27]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Ruth.4.6|Ruth 4:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּיָּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשׁ‎</span> [[Jer.49.9|Jer 49:9]] thieves ***damage as much as they want***; accusative of person = ***ruin, destroy***, [[1Sam.26.9|1Sam 26:9]]; [[1Sam.26.15|1Sam 26:15]]; [[Judg.20.21|Judg 20:21]]; [[Judg.20.25|Judg 20:25]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַ֫רְצָה‎</span>), v[[Judg.20.35|Judg 20:35]] v[[Judg.20.42|Judg 20:42]]; [[2Kgs.13.23|2Kgs 13:23]]; [[2Chr.24.23|2Chr 24:23]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> separ.), + 12 t., + (accusative of person omitted) [[Isa.51.13|Isa 51:13]] + 4 t., accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית דָּוִד‎</span> [[2Chr.21.7|2Chr 21:7]], absolute [[Isa.11.9|Isa 11:9]] = [[Isa.65.25|Isa 65:25]] also ***ruin*** one (by words) [[Prov.11.9|Prov 11:9]] accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַם‎</span> [[2Sam.24.16|2Sam 24:16]]; [[Deut.9.26|Deut 9:26]] land [[1Sam.6.5|1Sam 6:5]]; [[Jer.36.29|Jer 36:29]]; [[Dan.11.17|Dan 11:17]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); city wall [[2Sam.20.15|2Sam 20:15]] ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#The|Th]] here denominative from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחַת‎</span> ***they were making a pit***; &lt; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] (?) [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְחַשְּׁבִים‎</span> ***were devising***), [[Lam.2.8|Lam 2:8]], cities and nations [[Gen.18.28|Gen 18:28]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]], accusative omitted), [[Gen.19.13|Gen 19:13]]; [[Gen.19.14|Gen 19:14]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.37.12|Isa 37:12]] (Pi\`el in \|\| [[2Kgs.19.12|2Kgs 19:12]]), [[2Kgs.36.10|2Kgs 36:10]] (twice in verse) = [[2Kgs.18.25|2Kgs 18:25]] (twice in verse) + 11 t. + (Israel personified) [[Deut.4.31|Deut 4:31]]; [[Deut.10.10|Deut 10:10]]; [[2Kgs.8.19|2Kgs 8:19]], pride of Judah [[Jer.13.9|Jer 13:9]], earth [[Jer.51.1|Jer 51:1]] absolute with adverb accusative [[Dan.8.24|Dan 8:24]] (see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] conjecture <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשׂחֵחַ‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָשִׂיחַ‎</span> ***utter monstrous things***), compare [[1Chr.21.12|1Chr 21:12]] Participle as adjective, of lion [[Jer.2.30|Jer 2:30]], angel [[1Chr.21.15|1Chr 21:15]] = ***destroyer*** [[Exod.12.23|Exod 12:23]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Jer.22.7|Jer 22:7]]; [[Isa.54.16|Isa 54:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּוֺיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Jer.4.7|Jer 4:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּחַ מ‎</span> [[Jer.51.1|Jer 51:1]] singular collective (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּ‎</span> [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:126l»§ 126l</sup>; ***the destroying band***, compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]]) [[1Sam.13.17|1Sam 13:17]]; [[1Sam.14.15|1Sam 14:15]] (***spoilers, ravagers***); figurative for snare, trap, [[Jer.5.26|Jer 5:26]]. 

**2.** ***pervert, corrupt***, morally, accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> [[Gen.6.12|Gen 6:12]] ([[BDB#P|P]]; see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּרֶךְ‎</span> **6**), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Prov.6.32|Prov 6:32]], compare [[Zeph.3.7|Zeph 3:7]]; [[Ezek.23.11|Ezek 23:11]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְעִיבוּ עֲלִילָה‎</span> [[Ps.14.1|Ps 14:1]] = [[Ps.53.2|Ps 53:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשְׁחֵת תַּשְׁח‎</span> (+ verb of particular act) [[Deut.4.16|Deut 4:16]]; [[Deut.31.29|Deut 31:29]] declar. = ***act corruptly***, [[Isa.1.4|Isa 1:4]]; [[Deut.4.28|Deut 4:28]] (+ verb of act), [[2Chr.27.2|2Chr 27:2]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> compare [[Judg.2.19|Judg 2:19]]; [[Ezek.16.47|Ezek 16:47]] ***Participle*** as substantive [[Jer.6.28|Jer 6:28]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ מַשׁ‎</span> [[Prov.28.24|Prov 28:24]] ([[Prov.18.9|Prov 18:9]] see infra). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתַּֿשְׁחֵת‎</span> ***destroy not*** (catchword of old song or melody ?) in Psalm-titles: [[Prov.57.1|Prov 57:1]]; [[Prov.58.1|Prov 58:1]]; [[Prov.59.1|Prov 59:1]]; [[Prov.75.1|Prov 75:1]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁחָת‎</span> ***spoiled, ruined***, of a spring, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָקוֺר‎</span> [[Prov.25.26|Prov 25:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעְיָן נִרְפָּשׂ‎</span>); as substantive [[Mal.1.14|Mal 1:14]] sacrificing a ***spoiled thing***.
